price: Eles estão em escalões junto de Allah. E Allah, do que fazem, é Onividente
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
